hero.title: Make your talent play in your favor.
hero.subtitle: A platform that links you directly with amateurs and fans who will pay to live the real experience of playing, training, or sharing a court with you.

about.title: What is ProAmLinks?
about.p1: Pro Am Links is an international network that unites professionals from various sports with amateurs interested in real experiences of playing, training, etc.
about.p2: If you are a professional looking for a new way to value your experience, expand your network, and generate additional income, this is Pro Am Links.

how.title: How does it work?
how.p1: You register with your professional profile, define your conditions and availability, and we connect your proposal with fans willing to pay to share the experience with you. Management, payments, and communication are handled from a single platform, securely and transparently. No one will contact you until they have paid the fee you set yourself. Pro Am Links retains only 20% of each transaction, and the remaining 80% is yours.

why.title: Why join now?
why.p1: We are starting our expansion stage in Latin America, and the Uruguay Open is the first opportunity for professional players to join from the beginning. The first selected profiles will gain greater visibility in the countries where they decide to play.
why.p2: If you are a professional or part of the circuit, register by scanning the QR code and complete your file. Our team will review your profile and contact you to integrate you into the initial Pro Am Links professional program.
